p: An in vitro study by Asokan et al. in 2011 observed that health effects of sesame oil on oral health are due to saponification, emulsification, and mechanical cleansing [ 13]. Traditionally, sesame oil is considered to be the ideal one for oil pulling [ 13]. Studies have revealed that sesame oil and sunflower oil has an important role in reducing plaque-induced gingivitis [ 14].
